scripts.watch: npm run build && npm-run-all -p serve watch:html watch:js watch:css watch:images
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run copy:vendorjs && npm run copy:vendorfonts && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.copy:vendorjs: mkdir dist/js && cp node_modules/jsviews/jsviews.min.js dist/js && cp node_modules/json-editor/dist/jsoneditor.min.js dist/js && mkdir dist/js/sceditor && cp -R node_modules/sceditor/minified/ dist/js/sceditor && uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/javascripts/bootstrap.js -m -c -o dist/js/vendor.min.js
